name: Full Suspension Mountain Bike 24/26 Inch Wheel, 21-Speed Mountain Bicycle with Dual Disc Brakes Thumb Shifter, Carbon Steel Frame MTB Bike for Teenagers Adult Men Women Trail Commuter
short_description: [Full Suspension for All-Terrain Comfort] Equipped with both a front suspension fork and a rear shock absorber, this full-suspension mountain bike delivers unmatched comfort and control on rough trails. The dual suspension system absorbs impacts from rocks, and uneven terrain, reducing hand and wrist fatigue while keeping the wheels firmly planted for better traction. Whether you’re tackling technical descents or bumpy commutes, this bike ensures a smoother, more enjoyable ride.

[21-Speed Gear System with Thumb Shifters] The 21-speed drivetrain provides gearing for every riding scenario. From steep climbs to fast flats, the thumb shifters allow quick, precise gear changes without taking your hands off the handlebars. This intuitive system helps you maintain momentum and efficiency, making it perfect for riders of all skill levels—whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned trail enthusiast.

[Dual Disc Brakes for All-Weather Stopping Power] Equipped with reliable mechanical disc brakes on both wheels, this bike provides consistent, powerful braking in all conditions—rain, mud, or dust. Unlike rim brakes, disc brakes perform better in wet environments and require less maintenance, ensuring safety and peace of mind on every ride.

[Durable Carbon Steel Frame] The sturdy carbon steel frame combines strength with a lightweight design, making it both durable and easy to maneuver. Engineered to withstand the rigors of off-road riding, the frame resists bending or cracking while maintaining a responsive feel. Its geometry suits teenagers transitioning to adult bikes, smaller adults, or riders seeking a compact yet robust MTB for trails and city streets alike.

[Versatile 24-Inch Wheels for All Riders]The 24-inch wheels the perfect balance between agility and stability, catering to a wide range of riders. Perfect for teenagers, smaller adults, or anyone seeking a nimble bike without sacrificing control, these wheels roll smoothly over mixed terrain. Paired with wide, knobby tires, they provide excellent traction on dirt, gravel, and pavement, ensuring this bike is ready for trails, commutes, or weekend adventures.

name: SAVADECK Carbon Fiber Soft Tail Mountain Bike All Terrain Suspension Off-Road Fox Front Fork and Adult Racing, Firepower Orange-M6100-12 Speed
short_description: 【Lightweight Carbon Fiber Frame】Carbon fiber frame integrates a reinforced rear triangle with dual-link suspension and internal cable routing, reducing wind resistance while strengthening structural integrity. The dual-link system directs rear wheel movement along a controlled path, working with the frame’s natural flex to absorb shocks and maintain tire contact on rough terrain. Lightweight yet robust, the design ensures stable high-speed off-road performance and precise cornering control.

【Advanced Full-Suspension Design】Featuring a thru-axle shoulder-controlled hydraulic system for enhanced rigidity and precise wheel alignment, combined with a three-stage lockout DNM air shock absorber. Rebound adjustment and precision damping ensure optimal adaptability to rugged trails while maintaining lightweight performance.

【With Shimano DEORE M6100 Precision Shift Groupset】This carbon fiber mountain bike with shimano DEORE M6100 12-Speed shift groupset. Delivers smooth, precise shifting with ergonomic shift levers, ensuring reliable performance on technical trails. Built for durability and comfort during extended gravel or adventure rides.

【Upgraded Four-Piston Hydraulic Brakes】Featuring a dual opposed-piston design, these hydraulic disc brakes deliver precise control and robust stopping power for demanding rides. The optimized caliper paired with oversized pads enhances heat dissipation, reducing performance loss on long descents or repeated braking. Professionally tuned for responsive modulation, they ensure reliable braking across terrains while maintaining durability.

【Multi-Terrain Tire System】Engineered with 2.4" wide Continental all-terrain tires showcasing multidirectional tread grooves, delivering 15% enhanced roll efficiency with optimized power transfer. The aggressive pattern ensures confident grip across mud, gravel, and uneven surfaces. Supports easy upgrades to 2.6" tires for enhanced stability and gravel-filtering performance.

【Easy Installation】- Our carbon mountain bike is almost 90% pre-assembled before packing and shipping. We provide you with the perfect ride no matter if you are a bike commuter or professional entry-level racer, we got you covered.

name: Canyon Spectral 125 AL 5
short_description: Pure trail fun – Playful, agile, and built for speed, the Spectral 125 AL 5 is a hard-charging, short-travel trail bike that delivers big thrills on any terrain.
Precision-engineered alloy frame – A tough yet lightweight aluminum chassis with progressive geometry, designed for superior handling and long-term durability.
RockShox suspension system – 140mm front and 125mm rear travel with a RockShox 35 Gold RL fork and Deluxe Select+ shock for unbeatable control and confidence on technical descents.
Shimano Deore M6100 drivetrain – 12-speed shifting with a wide gear range, delivering efficiency and power for steep climbs and fast descents.
Ready for every ride – Tubeless-ready wheels, powerful Shimano Deore brakes, and a dropper seatpost make this bike fully equipped for aggressive trail riding.
product_description: Short-travel. Big ambition. The Spectral 125 AL 5 is a fast, fun, and highly capable trail bike built for riders who want to push the limits on every descent. Combining a lightweight, bombproof aluminum frame with a progressive suspension setup, this bike is designed to stay playful on flowy singletrack while handling steep, technical terrain with confidence. The shorter 125mm rear travel delivers an ultra-responsive feel, while a RockShox 35 Gold RL fork keeps you in control when the trail gets rowdy. Whether you're sending jumps, slashing corners, or grinding up climbs, the Spectral 125 AL 5 is the perfect tool for the job. Why choose Canyon? Canyon bikes are designed and engineered in Germany with precision craftsmanship, premium materials, and cutting-edge technology. Built by riders, for riders, every Canyon bike is the result of relentless testing, innovation, and attention to detail. Award-winning performance and superior quality—that’s what sets Canyon apart. Find your perfect fit The Spectral 125 AL 5 comes in a range of sizes to match every rider: S – 29” wheels | <177 cm (5'10") M – 29” wheels | 172 - 185 cm (5'8"- 6'0") L – 29” wheels | 180 - 194 cm (5'11"- 6'4") XL – 29” wheels | > 189 cm (6'2") Note: Raw finishes are rad. With the 'Real Raw' finish, we don't hide the final finish of the manufacturing process. Instead, the alloy frame is simply clear coated for protection. Warranty & Risk-Free Shipping 6-year Canyon warranty – Built to last, with world-class support. 30-day return policy – Ride it. Love it. Or return it. Easy assembly – Delivered in our specially designed Bike Guard box, 95% pre-assembled, with all tools included. Own the trail with the Spectral 125 AL 5 – designed for speed, precision, and pure riding fun.

name: Mongoose Impassse
short_description: ADULT MOUNTAIN BIKE: Take the trails by storm with the Impasse 2.0 by Mongoose. Featuring 29-inch wheels, this bike is perfect for riders from 5'5" - 6'0" tall. Roll over difficult terrain with ease.

BORN IN DIRT: Lightweight yet durable with an aluminum dual-suspension frame with tapered headtube, this womens and mens mountain bike is able to tackle varied conditions and keep up with adventurous riders.

BUILT FOR ADVENTURE: This Mongoose mountain bike is ready to roll on aluminum double wall wheels wrapped with 2.25-inch-wide knobby mountain tires for grip and stability. The suspension fork provides 100 mm of travel, ensuring a smooth ride.

SHIFT INTO GEAR: This 8-speed bike boasts an L-Twoo 1x8 drivetrain, 11-40 cassette and 30 tooth narrow/wide chainring for smooth shifting. Mechanical disc brakes provide reliable stopping power in varied conditions, giving riders control.

KNOW YOUR ROOTS: As one of the OGs in BMX and action sports, Mongoose has helped bring this movement to the world. For over 50 years, we've been all about epic rides and pushing limits – and we're just getting started.
product_description: Take the trails by storm with the Mongoose Impasse 2.0, a mountain bike built for all-terrain fun. With 29-inch wheels, this mountain bike for men and women is ideal for riders between 5'5" - 6'0" and is ready to jump into the action. Its alloy double-wall rims and 2.25-inch-wide knobby mountain tires provide the traction and durability needed to grip varied terrain. The lightweight yet tough aluminum dual-suspension frame is easy to handle while delivering big-time performance. Equipped with an L-Twoo 8-speed drivetrain, 11-40 cassette and 30 tooth narrow/wide chainring, this 8-speed bike ensures smooth shifting. Mechanical disc brakes provide reliable all-weather stopping power, keeping riders in control. When you’re headed off the beaten path, the Impasse is ready for the adventure. Assembly is easy with a few common household tools and the included instruction guide. At Mongoose, we know our roots – as pioneers in BMX and action sports for over 50 years, we're dedicated to delivering an epic ride every time. Get ready to push the limits.
